name: Ping (itch) (Juan Rodriguez)
description:
Lovecraftian Submarine Survival Roguelike extraordinaire. Top down view of your sub in a dark sea. Search for relics in uncharted waters, infested with eldritch horrors.

CREDITS

Simón Sánchez - Artist, animator
Leandro Fernández - UI Artist, Graphic Designer
Juan Rodríguez - Programmer
Nestor Etcheverry - Programmer
Camila Bustillo - Music, sound design
Gastón Ibarburu - Game Designer
Santiago Rosas - Artist, animator

CONTROLS

WASD - Move
Space Bar - Radial Sonar
Middle Click - Directional Sonar
Left Click - Fire Torpedo
Right Click - Deploy/Detonate bomb

OBJECTIVE
Follow the compass to your destination and collect the 3 holy relics

Created during the Global Game Jam 17 in Montevideo, Uruguay
